    public abstract class FoodItem
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item

    Class representing items that can be used as a food.

      • FoodItem

        public FoodItem(java.lang.String name,
                char displayChar,
                int hpRecover,
                java.lang.String verb)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of this Item
        displayChar - the character to use to represent this item if it is on the ground
        hpRecover - amount of health points recovered when consuming this food.
        verb - verb to use for this food, e.g. "chews", "eats"
